name: The nightshift
description:
The Nightshift

The nightshift is a game made by 13darkice37,  evilc00kie and Tch1b0 former known as Dark Energy Studios, in which you have to find your work-life balance with the character <employee>. 

This is our entry for the GODOT WILD JAM # 37 - Inside the Machine.

Gamemusic "Nightshift" by Noisetäter

Keys:  

D or ARROW_RIGHTmove rightA  or ARROW_LEFTmove leftW or ARROW_UPmove upS  or ARROW_DOWNmove downEinteract
